response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $8,000. Considering this, I am extending to you an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product for $10,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive unparalleled value and satisfaction. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this special offer.", "product_price": 10000}
